website_summaries.verdict: An affordable regrowth shampoo featuring an all-star list of natural ingredients without compromising on efficacy.
pros: Contains caffeine to stimulate hair follicles and DHT blockers to prevent them from shrinking
Lots of natural oils and vitamins to thicken hair and nourish scalp
cons: May strip hair of color if dyed

customer_reviews.title: HOLD UP!  REWIND, BUY, FOLLOW DIRECTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: I am one big beauty fanatic and I’m always looking for the best best thing and I tell you that “THIS IS THE BEST THING EVER” I was suffering from hair loos and my hair thinning , but as soon as I massaged this beauty in my hair in two times my hair was thicker and had grown. You have to follow the directions because if you don’t than you ain’t gonna see the beauty that is ready to grow out of you! And it helps to take vitamins , drinks lots of water and just love yourself . That’s is all you need to do when you buy this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Brian Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy, 3-4 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that I would have a large maintenance schedule with this shampoo after reading other reviews, but decided to give it a try. I'm so glad I did! Directions clearly say to leave in for 3-4 minutes. It feels great on my scalp! Not sure if it will help slow down hair loss, but doing something seems better than doing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Three months after discontinuing Rogaine, the hair on my temples was very thin. After using this shampoo and taking Saw Palmetto supplements I saw significant hair growth over the next 3 months. The shampoo makes great suds even though its sulfate free. It has a wonderful light citrus scent that doesn’t linger. The pH is perfect and leaves my hair soft and manageable even without conditioner. I would prefer it even if it didn’t help my hair grow. The only problem is the plastic container is stiff, so it’s a little hard to get the shampoo out.
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, helps sensitive scalp
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my mid 40s. I don't know that I've had hair loss, but I do have a terrible scalp that is sensitive to everything. This is the first shampoo I've used, including prescriptions, that actually seems to heal the sores on my scalp. The most I've ever hoped for is not making it worse. This stuff smells amazing and is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Beers

customer_reviews.title: Works on rough hairs in one application
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Shampoo for summer as I ride motorcycle and lot of outdoor activity. Tried many Shampoos, but none worked well except this one. This one gives a lasting effect and hairs are soft and smooth for a longer period of time when exposed to sun and wind. Doesn't have a strong smell but slight smell is good and the thickness is perfect. small quantity is good for the whole head.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo! Felt the difference right away!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo! I was surprised to see and feel the difference from the first few applications. My hair feels much softer and thicker and healthier. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shampoo. I have no idea what biotin is but I thought that if this works I would certainly recommend it. I was disappointing when i didn't see a difference after a month but since I ran out other shampoo, I jest kept using this one not even thinking about its purpose. My barber, who is also a close friend of mine, noticed that my hair was thinker up top and mentioned it to me. I didn't notice it until he brought it up.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Kerzhner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  It totally works.
customer_reviews.text: I got a bad haircut where my hair was thinned out too much. My hair continued to feel so thin and had breakage every time I washed and brushed. I Saw a huge difference after one shampoo. The chemicals in my old shampoo must have contributed to my hair breaking. Been using it 10 days and it’s amazing. I use the biotin conditioner too. I hope this product is never discontinued. Prior to the bad haircut my hair was shedding too much anyway. So I’ll continue to use even after my hair grows out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t made any difference on my hair. Still shedding tremendously and hair isn’t softer. Will have to try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Waters

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Well this stuff feels great in the morning! I feel woken up and ready to start the day. After looking at ingredients I realized this was a natural product that I should try. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Wes H

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this yesterday with the conditioner. I didn’t brush out my hair after my shower, and I used my 2in1 styler to blow dry it. I didn’t use any product. At first, I didn’t notice much. My ends are very dry and dead. But as the night went on, I kept wanting to touch my hair. It’s so soft and looks so healthy and bouncy and volumized and ThAts with NO product. It’s still soft today and still smells amazing! I would recommend! For sure!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: It’s too early to tell as far as hair growth. Just used it twice since I received product. But I like the way it lathers up and how it smells. A small amount goes a long way. Will most likely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrud Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: A miracle Biotin shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I read that Biotin can help with hair loss and thinning hair so I purchased this shampoo after a friend recomended this brand. I would say within one week I could see a positive difference in my hair. it looked much better compared to washing with a basic store shampoo. it also looked fuller as well. my hair now truly amazing! I would highly recommend this shampoo for thinning hair!
customer_reviews.author: liran

customer_reviews.title: Form skeptical to believer
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I decided to try this just to kind of help in awkward pixie growing out phase, and honestly my hair has grown like crazy since I started using this, and I only wash my hair a couple times a week. I love that it doesn’t have the bad crap that other shampoos do, and it smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It made my hair a little heavy so it did not style easily. I am returning . Used for 5 shampoos. Don't know if that was long enough to see growth but I didn't see a dif.
customer_reviews.author: IDA CICERANI

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: There is definitely less hair on the shower floor since I started using Biotin Shampoo For Hair Growth. The product is packaged well, comes quickly and feels high quality. The argan oil component feels nice in my hair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This biotin shampoo is an excellent product. It smells great and leaves my hair feeling soft, smooth and clean! I just added pictures of the ingredients to answer a question.
customer_reviews.author: J. N.

customer_reviews.title: I Would Order Again
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo works really well. It does a nice job of cleaning without over-drying and smells really good. I plan to re-order soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Oily scalp
customer_reviews.text: I searched a lot of shampoos and this one really helps with my oily scalp
customer_reviews.author: Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: To soon to tell if products are effective but lathers well and leaves my hair soft but not flat.
customer_reviews.author: Ep

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: I love this natural hair growth shampoo. It’s been about a week and I already see a difference! It goes so great with the thickening spray. And I love that it’s natural !
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear2

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: It is very good ... it is help me to much with my hair !!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Mujica

customer_reviews.title: A miracle find!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. I. It only notice a difference in the thickness of my hair but the shine and smell is astonishing! I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It absolutely works. As a guy I don’t love the scent. It smells generic. Wish it smelled more modern. Maybe a scent for men...?
customer_reviews.author: Erik Muzzy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Upsetting
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 3 times and even more hair was falling out than before. When I would go to put the conditioner in my hands would be covered in hair and there was significantly more in the drain. Very upsetting :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biotin shampoo to prevent receding hair.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shampoo that can save my hair from receding further. I previously purchased shampoo from Paisle that worked really well, my hair looked and felt much thicker. I recommend this shampoo, you want you're hair to look and feel thicker. Biotin shampoo from Paisle. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Haggai Shimoni

customer_reviews.title: Biotin Shampoo For Hair Growth
customer_reviews.text: Great product together with the Thickening Spray. Surprisingly. it really made a significant improvement for me.
customer_reviews.author: yaniv zilberman

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Leaves hair feeling thick, yet soft and with plenty of volume. After a couple times using it I could feel more general volume in my scalp. Very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big difference in the quality of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a while now and really notice a positive difference in the quality and the texture of my hair . I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: ilana lea

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shampoo that works
customer_reviews.text: Since starting to use this shampoo I’ve noticed a big difference in my hair volume. I use this a few times a week and I love the results. My hair is healthier and thicker than ever. This shampoo also smells really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Noga Aviv

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t write enough about this product. Not only does it feel so much better than the dove shampoo I used to use, I can see results. My hair is just unbelievably smooth and in much better condition that just a week ago when I received it. Would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Susen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever. My hair looks and feels so much better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo seems to work for me, not only my hair looks healthier it also seems to be fuller. I will certainly buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Harel Garni

customer_reviews.title: If you have a question about any of there products there
customer_reviews.text: Great hair product for the money. I have used many different shampoos in the past but this one surpasses them all. Hair fallout at a minimum, I actually have to look hard for fallen hairs in my dark blue bath towel. I have white hair.
customer_reviews.author: rob avram

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered this shampoo, but I was very pleasantly surprised. It made my hair look fuller after the first shampooing. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Laor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo!!! It gives life to my daul hair. Great for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Aviya Flur-Gavra

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo made my thin hair super flat so I had to return it. It might work for your hair, but for me it did not work out.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Franke

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shampoo! My hair feels terrific after using it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: this product works
customer_reviews.text: this product works i've been using it for over a month and it works great for me I'll use it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Wish the scent was better. Haven’t noticed that much of a difference since using.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Really good product will buy again
customer_reviews.text: It works well especially with volume control and with less hair loss. Good product. .
customer_reviews.author: linda summers

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Love the product make my hair looks amazing!! will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gavra1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shampoo, pleasant feeling even after a long time. Too bad they don't sell larger bottles
customer_reviews.author: Isidor R.

customer_reviews.title: amazing shampoo
customer_reviews.text: very good product, exactly what i was looking for thank you
customer_reviews.author: doron nissim

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really love the product I will totally keep buying it
customer_reviews.author: Ester Mizrahi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works like magic. Used it for a week and already started seeing a huge difference
customer_reviews.author: Reuven Perlow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast delivery . Will Definitely order more products.
customer_reviews.author: Ben T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Great results!! Hair feels soft and more full just after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe Y

customer_reviews.title: Good all around
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, saw effects soon best product I’ve seen in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Yehuda Jian

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awful. It left my hair feeling like straw and so dry I couldn't comb it without breakage. For a shampoo of this price and especially one to help grow hair I can't imagine anyone buying it unless they have thick oily hair. If there was ever any regrowth it would probably be because of all the hair that brook off at the roots. of
customer_reviews.author: voupex

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have fine blow away hair and just after one use my hair was full, thicker, and more manageable. I will purchase this product again. My only concern was the seal was punctured and leaking in the plastic bag when it arrived. When I say punctured, I am talking about a sharp instrument was used. I almost returned it because of that fact, but decided to take a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic find
customer_reviews.text: My daughter tried it first. She has oily scalp with dry hair. I bought fir her based on similar concerns and positive feedback. She absolutely loved it. I decided to try it as well. Love the scent, lathering (which is sometimes an issue with color safe shampoos) , and the hair felt clean and soft. Was easy to style too. Will definitely buy again despite it being a bit pricey. It’s also thick and should last a while. Please don’t discontinue it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Little bit goes long way... Great smell... Hair looks and feels healthy. Less hair falling out is what I noticed after two weeks of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: MATIJA

customer_reviews.title: It works haha
customer_reviews.text: Lol. I got this cause it was only sulfate free caffeine added shampoo during Coronavirus scare that was decently priced. No hair loss issues and boy oh boy was I in for a surprise. My hair has whooshed into action and now I’ve been forced to start attempting to self trim my hair with my shaver. Lol. Guess it does what it says it does but lollllll
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Husbands favorite shampoo for fuller hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle my husbands been on and he loves it. He struggles with his hair and this has been the best shampoo according to him. He raves about it, his hair feels thicker. And leaves it with fuller body too. Great scent. It goes a long way too, he’s conservative with the amount he uses and still gets great results. Very glad we discovered this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Nope!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. Makes the hair oily after 1 day. Not a good choice and the bottle is also too hard to handle. As you squeeze your hands hurt as the plastic bottle is extremely hard. I also didn’t see any other improvement. It doesn’t do any good for the hair.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Lathers good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this a while, doesn't make my hair itch like some. Not completely sure about making hair thicker, luckily my hair is relatively thick. It's a nice shampoo I'd be happy to continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: This product helped my hair look healthy again!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this shampoo helps my hair look like it has more volume. It also helps it look more healthy by adding shine. My hair has been more dull looking since I have gotten older and this shampoo helps my hair look and feel softer, shinier and overall more healthy. The smell was also nice and not overpowering. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cain

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily scalp
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is ok if you want to wash your hair every day. I usually wash mine every other day but with this shampoo by the second day, my scalp was very oily. I won't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: 5+ start shampoo, must try
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is by far the best I tried on my hair, it is hard to believe but my dandruff has completely gone after 4 days of usage, not a joke. Hair feels great and healthy. Must to try shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: electric

customer_reviews.title: Great product with instant results
customer_reviews.text: I’m a repeat customer! Love the product, you only need to use a small amount at a time so it goes along way. Instant results. Hair feels full after you dry it. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: RI

customer_reviews.title: Shedding has decreased.
customer_reviews.text: After a few washes, I have noticed that my shedding has decreased. I have not noticed any difference in texture/softness, but this product is not making it worse as some brands have. I would recommend and will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: darlene humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Bioten has improved my hair texture
customer_reviews.text: My hair has thicken since I began treatments. I continue to use Bioten because I have had so much improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn n

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: No lather, doesn’t feel like you washed your hair and smells kind of weird. Save yourself the hassle and keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: wanted More

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great results
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended to me about this shampoo and the hair spray ... Wonderful product, I can see and feel it works
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: For the shampoo I didn’t really see much Improvement. Didn’t see much in the volume or the softness.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: It don’t do nothing I bought the shampoo that goes with this too and that don’t do nothing either
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Garrity

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo I feel like it makes my hair feels really soft. Love the smell too
customer_reviews.author: Ofer Z

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo smells good and stimulates scalp
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. I’m using it after chemo to hopefully get thicker hair as it grows back!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: No Caffeine in ingredients listed on  ottle
customer_reviews.text: Caffeine not listed in ingredients..Caffien is listed..That is not caffeine..False advertising?..what is Caffien?looked it up on Google..no word meaning for caffien appears..HMmmm??
customer_reviews.author: JAK

product_meta.title: Biotin Shampoo For Hair Growth Natural Caffeine Hair Loss Treatment Shampoo For Thinning Hair Thickening DHT Blocker For Men Women Sulfate Free Safe On Color Treated Hair Coconut + Argan (Shampoo)
product_meta.description:
BIOTIN SHAMPOO FOR HAIR GROWTH  

 BIOTIN+ Therapy treatment 

 This all natural DHT blocker caffeine shampoo is made of the highest grade botanical extracts and essential oils and was meticulously formulated by scientists and hairdressers bringing the best natural active treatment for female and male hair loss 

 

 Our hair is made of keratin protein, built from amino acids formed in result of the reaction of cell enzymes and biotin. The biotin vitamin B7 in our body is key to the production of healthy hair, providing an essential ingredient in the hair growth process. 

 

 We infused Caffeine to recharge and stimulate hair growth encouraging your scalp to produce and grow more hair naturally. Along with pure Moroccan argan oil - Nettle Root - Hemp seed oil and coconut oil all known to promote hair growth prevent split ends and repair breakage while returning hydration to dry frizzy hair. Use daily for thicker fuller denser hair, an energized scalp and organic shine. 

 

 COCONUT OIL - With pure coconut oil’s natural moisture this product will not only energize and stimulate your scalp with biotin and caffeine but also moisturize and nourish your hair and scalp from follicle through the entire shaft making it the best of thickening hair products 

 

Without harsh chemicals such as Formaldehyde - Lye - Parabens - Sulfates - Phosphates - Phthalates - SLS - Salt - or Sodium Chloride 🇺🇸 Made in a U.S.A. facility that exceeds cGMP standards Thickening Shampoo Biotin Shampoo for hair loss Natural Nettle Shampoo with Caffeine Shampoo With Argan Oil for Hair Loss With natural Coconut oil - Hemp Seed Oil & Nettle for Hair Growth PAISLE BOTANICS 100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE – This natural thinning hair shampoo contains no harsh chemicals like Formaldehyde Lye Parabens Sulfates Phosphates Phthalates SLS or sodium chloride.
feature_bullets: CAFFEINE ANTI HAIR LOSS SHAMPOO contains BIOTIN B complex vitamins Caffeine & Argan Oil - All known anti hair loss treatments that promote hair regrowth And prevent shedding
BIOTIN SHAMPOO for men and women - Stimulating revitalizing botanicals serve as the best anti breakage & anti hair loss treatment caffeine shampoo

HAIR REGROWTH SHAMPOO FOR WOMEN AND MEN prevents hair loss by blocking DHT the primary cause for thin weak hair by removing DHT this premium Biotin DHT blocker shampoo will give you frizz free shiny thicker and denser hair
PROVEN TO STOP SHEDDING hair by strengthening and stimulating the scalp with Biotin and Caffeine For fine thin or thick hair - This natural thickening shampoo is Vitamin E rich

ARGAN Shampoo for hair loss growth therapy for fine hair - With pure argan oil and Nettle this hair thickener for women and men is the best natural cleanser for all hair types sensitive scalp and sensitive skin
